author: gtully
msg: follow on from resolution to test case, disable concurrentStoreAndDispatchTopics by default as it can lead to the store and cursor getting out of order and when the cache is exhausted, messages can potentially be missed. https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/AMQ-2864

author: angela
msg: JCR-2710 : Add support for large number of users in a group [fix UserAccessControlProvider]

author: felixk
msg: Just to make sure we don't have race conditions when one test class is overwriting the target/schema directory of another class when running concurrent

author: bodewig
msg: tofile is incompatible with non-file resources.  PR 49756
